title: AYR Strategies' Edge
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: CEO Jonathan Sandelman returns to the show to discuss AYR Strategies' recent deals and its steady rise to the top of the MSO pack. 7 M&A transactions in past 4 months. Very accretive deals for shareholders: great assets at a fair price. Want partners and shareholders to be excited to partner with AYR. AYR stock a big reason companies do deals with them. Importance of the flower. Why change in US political climate accelerated AYR's path for growth, what they like about Florida and where else they may be heading. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
